name: Python Packages from PyPI (via pip)
description: A feature to install Python packages from the Python Package Index via pip for all users on a devcontainer. Supports a list of packages as well as a requirements.txt file stored inside the container.

packages.description: A space-separated list of one or more packages to install, provided in the same format you would provide to 'pip install'.

requirementsFile.description: Absolute path to a requirements.txt file inside the container defining one or more packages to install.
